message: Anyone have any interest in/progress on working on this? It would be super useful to have a .app file on OS X and .exe file on Windows.
someone was talking about doing a bundled exe a few days ago in #redcar

You can run Jruby -S rake app_bundle to make a .app file, which works well (once you add in the icon). I know Jruby also has a command to compile a .exe and some .jars, but I haven't tried it with redcar
I rolled a *.deb some time ago, though at this moment I don't know how...
there is a .app file for redcar knocking about
I think there's one in headius redcar fork downloads
Or you can copy your wrapped_redcar code into a "run shell script" action in automator to get yourself an .app
